catch_copy: Discover the fascinating world of colouring mandalas for adults and children. Escape from stress with amazing designs and a wide range of colours, creating your own artistic creations.
copyright_text:

description:
Prepare yourself for a world of tranquility and creativity with "Coloring Books: Mandalas", the perfect videogame to practice diligence and focus or simply to enjoy a relaxing activity. This game immerses you in a universe of detailed colouring pictures and complex art designs that will challenge you to put your full attention and concentration into each stroke.

Highlights:
-Variety of designs: Immerse yourself in pages of meticulously detailed mandalas that will provide hours of entertainment.
-Variety of colours: Create works of art with multiple colour palettes, shades and variations that allow you to customise every detail to your liking.
-Music ambience: Turn background music on or off to set the mood for your art session.
-Advanced tools: Use the zoom to accurately colour in every corner of your mandala.
-Share your art: Share your creations on Facebook and Twitter and let the world discover them.
Extensive gallery: Enjoy a wide selection of ready-to-colour mandala images, you'll always find something new to inspire you!

A unique and revitalising experience! With "Coloring Books: Mandalas" you will enjoy colouring, fill your energy and calm your mind. Perfect for all art lovers and those looking for a relaxing escape from everyday life.
